website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-gauge steel, larger-size chock lock easily secures mid-size trailers, cars, and boats.
pros: Features an opening of 11.25-inches when unlocked and a reach of 10.5 inches when locked
cons: Rust and debris can damage the keyhole
Be sure to use the included cover to help prevent damage

customer_reviews.title: Thieves sawed through two of them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these through Amazon, and put them on one side of my dual axle trailer. Last week,the trailer (and my new tractor) were stolen. As for the Trimax, it appears the thief used a sawzall to partially cut through one arm, then bent the arm back. I would include pictures, but no sense providing a how-to for bad guys. I'm sure it took a while to saw through two of them, but it sure didn't stop them.
customer_reviews.author: SPH

customer_reviews.title: I bought one of these last summer. This morning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these last summer. This morning my trailer was stolen. They just used an iron bar or something and wedge it against the wheel and bent one side out no problem. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Laduke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome clamp lock with a major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome clamp lock with a major flaw. First off, when I got it, was just blow away how massive and tough it is. Very well made. Worth the price to get this XL as it will lock the wheel and the frame of a small trailer. Here's the flaw, the lock itself is horrible. I picked it easily with a thing I had but I won't tell you what because the crooks will try to do the same. -2 stars, I hope the fix this lock issue and the new customers will get a well made 5 star item. The shear size of this thing will scare the small time thieves away.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Yao

customer_reviews.title: One TOUGH Cookie
customer_reviews.text: Device appears well-designed and heavy made. Locking device appears to be unique, and supplies the user with three Keys. If this device is anywhere NEAR as Tough as the Clam-Shell Package it comes in, then I know I can rest at night w/o worrying that someone might be able to 'trick it open'. Hint: You might want to have a Smoke-Wrench, or a Saws-All, or other similar Heavy Hand-Tools HANDY just to open the Clam-Shell package this device comes in. (a Jack-Hammer wouldn't work, but a Pneumatic Chisel-Hammer MIGHT open its Plastic Clam-Shell Package).
customer_reviews.author: Artmon

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Three stars because I just got it. It took longer to get it out of the packaging than it did to install. I used the size guide and got the 75 for my cargo trailer. It’s a bit loose, but not so much that you could remove it without unlocking. It’s nice not to have to turn a key to lock it once you have it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, great fit and easy to use. However, I watched a video review and realized that my key code number is almost the same as the review key. Leading me to believe that either the key codes are bogus or there are very few key combinations. Nevertheless, it's a good deterrence against opportunistic auto theft.
customer_reviews.author: slickerthanslick

customer_reviews.title: Potential faulty lock mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these products. The first one works well so I bought another. On a trip last week I used the new one and the locking mechanism wouldn't release. It was really frustrating to waste time trying to release the locking mechanism, which it finally did. I notice that my other one locks and releases smoothly. There is some hitch, not smoothly locking or releasing, with locking the newer one with the key. Unfortunately I can't return as I just missed the return window. The take away message here is make sure immediately that this lock will reliably lock and release! Again my first one works well so didn't expect the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deterent
customer_reviews.text: After having my Husquavarna lawn tractor stolen, I bought this item. It fits around the rear tire and will make the thieves have to work harder to take my new tractor. Of course it won't stop a determined thief ... but maybe I will hear them huffing and puffing while shoving it to their trailer/truck and I'll have time to use my shotgun!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, except from lock to tire 3-4 inch gap
customer_reviews.text: On my cargo trailer the tires are 225/75 R15. Because of the brake, the wheel lock can"t go through the hole in the rim, so it clamps the rim itself. Not bad, except from lock to tire 3-4 inch gap. Should have took into account the size of the brake rotor! I can see this being a leverage problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Can be defeated with a bungee or a zip tie or a string
customer_reviews.text: When properly installed, lift up the end and tie it up. Trailer tire will still roll. Towed my trailer with it locked on. Will attempt to bend the arms to go through the wheel frame.
customer_reviews.author: MasterSergeantUSAF

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It wont stop you from driveing. I was a little disapointed when i took off forgetting it was on. But defintly not allowing for any speeds, and will atract all types of unwanted attention. And what a mess it mad of my storage bouncing tbe trail about. lol
customer_reviews.author: RION

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just got one. Compact and easy to store, adjustable, and seems study. I haven't experienced anyone trying to remove it so I can't speak on effectiveness, but I guess it being on at all will keep honest people honest... Anyway, no complaints here, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best Security Device Out there for Trucks!
customer_reviews.text: Great item! Travelled 2060 miles in move for work. Used this with 26ft Uhaul truck when parked at hotel overnight. Works great. If this device is on your tire you will NOT move. Have first hand knowledge - forgot to remove one morning and didn't get anywhere. Remember to take it off!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item to alert any would be culprits thinking about ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item to alert any would be culprits thinking about stealing my motorhome. The color stands out. The claw foot serves as a great cholk. I recommend this to any RV owner, farmer, or boat owner. It is constructed to last. Durable steel product made to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: James J.

customer_reviews.title: From one wheel to the next....
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. What I like most is that it is very easy to set up and adjustable. I normally have it on the wheel of my travel trailer. When I use the trailer I put it on my Dodge Charger. It has a nice range of adjustment - the trailer tire is 205mm and the Charger is 245mm. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: But two of these put one on the UTV other on the tire of the trailer itself. I watch too many ring doorbell videos of trailers and machines being taken out of driveways. This is just another obstacle they’ll have to get past if they decide to still mine.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: A Great Piece of Security for Trailers
customer_reviews.text: After having my trailer broken into with bolt cutters, I purchased a set of 3 keyed-alike Trimax puck locks to secure the doors. Now I'm adding this versatile piece of enhanced security. Frankly, the most difficult part of operating this was getting it out of the package. All 3 pistol grip keys (can't be duplicated at True Value) fit well and operate smoothly. I sprayed the lock and the sliding mechanism with silicone spray. It locks without a key by pressing in the brass lock cylinder. The weather cap (not shown) is just OK. I imagine it will soon break and need to be replaced with a rubber crutch tip.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schiddt

customer_reviews.title: good but not the end-all
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my camper-trailer that, for want of a more secure location, is parked in my driveway. I wanted a civilian "boot" which this appeared to be, but the main drawback is there is no way to stop someone from simply detaching the whole tire. A real "boot" covers the lugs. That said, if you have a locking lug or something like that, this can be a great theft deterrent for your camper, boat trailer, toy hauler, etc. The bright color makes this thing very obvious, even tucked under the trailer. Also, the locking mechanism is unusual, which makes it much more difficult to pick or force... Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Prepper'd

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: this is a good idea as it is a inconvience to anyone trying to steal your trailer, it is a bit oversize for my 14 inch wheels even at its lowest size, if you are trying to lock up a wheel wider than the standard 70 series you use this but undr that like a 78 lots of room there but still is effective in causing greaf to the theaf. I use it to keep the honest, honest. The trailer has other safety features to counter stuff. .
customer_reviews.author: acpat

customer_reviews.title: Restricted fit around the tire
customer_reviews.text: This is a five star product but may not be the right product for every trailer tire. The issue I see is that the hubs on my trailer are large enough that they restrict the access for the wheel chock to engage the tire rim from the back of the tire. This wasn't an issue that I had noticed until I actually tried them, they should provide some security but would have preferred that they had fit on tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Billb

customer_reviews.title: Still you can drive with the lock on it.
customer_reviews.text: I place the lock every night and I removed in the morning I was so happy, until one day I forget to remove the lock in morning and my SUV start driving you can hear a click you can drive it and tow it because it follow the motion of the wheel. Big disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: samir jeddi

customer_reviews.title: Worth having if you feel the need for extra security ..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, remove. Gives me a little extra peace of mind when we're on the road but might want to leave the trailer for a night or two. A coupler lock is also a good addition in those circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CHOCK!
customer_reviews.text: Being faced with a possible theft of my equipment trailer, I needed to look for ways to secure it and make sure it stays put. This chock lock is AWESOME. It grabs hold of the wheel 14" wheel very well. It locks and hardly moves. The locking system is unique, to say the least.. in a good way, of course. One recommendation- make sure you get a set of lug nuts that locks your wheel onto your trailer. A thief might bring along a spare and change your chocked tire for his leaving your AWESOME chock lock and tire where your trailer used to be! Ha! You need to be one step ahead of the thief!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Thieves are worthless trash
customer_reviews.text: More of a deterrent, have the trim ax 175 boot lock and coupler lock with tongue pin. Better safe than getting trailer stolen. A worthless thief doesn’t care about your hard earned $! They’re to lazy to get a damn job like the rest of us. The more locks the better off you are, F$&k off all you thieves
customer_reviews.author: Frank gallagher

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the larger model by Trimax that covers the wheel hub. It took a special tool to use (hope you don't loose it), when I put it on my trailer I could not get one of the doors that covers the bolt to close. I returned it for this model, keep it simple I guess. The simple clamp design works great, I have it attached to a trailer in my yard. It may not be as secure as the larger model, but if someone wants your stuff bad enough all you can do is slow them down or make them decide to move on.
customer_reviews.author: user212

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my trailer secure
customer_reviews.text: With the thefts of trailers on the rise, I did everything I could do to keep my trailer locked up in my driveway. I have so many locks on it I just don't see how they could take it. I have seen this particular lock being used on 4 wheelers at a popular sporting goods store and if they trust them, I knew I should too so I ordered one. This sucker is never off of my tire unless the trailer is locked on the back of my pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality and heavy. It’s a great way for me to chock and lock my travel trailer wheel! Easy on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Not bad at all Willis"
customer_reviews.text: This things works pretty good. Great for blades. I have it on 20"x9" Irocs wheels. Easy to put on and take off with the key. Would take drilling or a cute guy wheel to get passed it. I would definately recommend it. I also recommend getting wheel lug locks for your wheels or someone can just take your wheel off.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Tough Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made (per one previous review I checked elswhere and the larger one was mixed up with the smaller one on the Amaxon site -- ordered the one that stated it was smaller and is plenty large for my 31" jeep wheels (could fit larger wheels - thanks for the tip!).No way for someone to drive away with my jeep with that on -- would have to be able to pick the unique lock (doubtful). Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Delta Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Solid and secure.
customer_reviews.text: This lock does just what it is supposed to do. It adds one more layer of security. It's not extremely secure or robust but certainly up to the task. For the price it is an excellent Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nessim

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting only 3 months in. Good security though.
customer_reviews.text: Only have had for 3 months and already rusting. Very disappointed, but cheap price brings cheap product. Other than rust it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stokesberry

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Clamp
customer_reviews.text: Works great no issues. I wouldn't make this the only thing to secure the trailer. As with all anti-theft devices, it is deterrent and still can be probably pried off. I use two Titanium shackle locks for the chains and a 377KA Universal Coupler Lock (both by Master Lock) to secure my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: I have one cut off so they could steal my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one cut off so they could steal my tractor so they only slow the theif down not stop them. Also you need locking lugs for tandem trailers or 2 boots on one side or they just take off the wheel and away they go...they can even replace it with your spare if that’s not locked on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In your face
customer_reviews.text: This are huge and brightly colored. If I were a thief, I'd find it too much of a hassle to try to wrestle off. Bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: I like it but...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it doesn't work well in the winter or when it gets dirty. In the winter it rains and then the lock freezes and you're screwed. Or if you get dirt in it the lock jams and you're screwed. It is a great deterrent if you keep it clean and warm. Also keep in mind that you can buy units that cover the lug nuts so they can't just switch the wheel and go.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun G

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 and no problems, nothing stolen. But. They have locked up and there is minor rust.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dee

customer_reviews.title: Will slow a thief down
customer_reviews.text: A little sloppy on my 225/75/15 tire but works, will slow a thief down some
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL ( from Oregon )

customer_reviews.title: For the kubota
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the smaller one which didn't fit the rtv wheel so used that one on a trailer which was great because it also acts as a block to keep it from rolling. This one fits the bigger tires perfectly and we are very excited to have a little more anti-theft protection on a vehicle which uses a universal key.
customer_reviews.author: atl peach

customer_reviews.title: Not only good for trailer use, but regular vehicle use as well
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this product a try to secure my mustang in my driveway. I have 10.5" rear wheels on it and this wheel lock fits perfectly on them. I love the look of this product as it's very bright and will aid in deterring any potential future theft attempts. It's also very well made. The added lock cover is great for keeping the elements away from weather the locking mechanism. I highly recommend this to anyone trying to secure a trailer or a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Obarzanek

customer_reviews.title: Too large for trailer tires
customer_reviews.text: Too large for 15" trailer tires. Hopefully the appearance of security is enough of deterrent. Good construction but too large, would work great for full size tires.
customer_reviews.author: christopher s fuller

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Will slow down the thief’s. But nothing is unstealable
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL S ORELLANA

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews and think they must have been mechanically impaired. This device slips over the tire easily and you just need make sure that it cannot be pulled off the tire. You do need to purchase wheel locks too. I notice other 5th Wheel Trailers had a device that prevented hook-up. That might have been a better purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: City Surveyor

customer_reviews.title: Good product, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I’ve used this on my tiny camper for 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: LinJo

customer_reviews.title: Built Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very well built but didn't fit my enclosed trailer very well, I have a 6x10 trailer single axle and it was made for a larger tire.
customer_reviews.author: RCMan

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: A wheel lock/chock, works great, fits right on my Empire Cargo 24' Car hauler. Its beefy and will definately at least deter some thiefs with a nice set of wheel locks.
customer_reviews.author: HandsomeRob

customer_reviews.title: This works great on tall tires.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Product fits my tall side by side tires great. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: johnny lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this as it is easy to use and discourages theft.
customer_reviews.author: E. C.

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Saved over $20 buying on Amazon versus trailer supply store. Very sturdy, heavy and durable. Easy and quick to use. Lock has a cover so it keeps the weather out of the locking mechanism. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FLreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This thing is going to be perfect for my Jeep camping trailer. It goes perfectly around it's 33" BFG M/T tires. A theft it should deter. What a pain it would be to try and get this thing off for a criminal.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This device helped our trailer with thieves moving on to other easier targets on our long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie 1974

customer_reviews.title: Used for several weeks on a road trip
customer_reviews.text: Great lock and extremely durable. I'd like to see anyone try and get it off without damaging the tire or rim. I used it on a 5 week road trip, locking/unlocking everyday at stops. No issues. Can't speak to how it performs in rain or severe weather, it was sunny the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Pianoman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good? Only been deployed on two trips so far on my teardrop trailer but perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: tyrone tillman

customer_reviews.title: Great security product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Polaris Ranger. This is the size to by for UTV/ATV. Solid steel construction.
customer_reviews.author: David Edds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, deters theft, solid unit. I have these on all of my trailers. My trailers are still where they are supposed to be when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonOgre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Used it several days in Albuquerque along with a good lock and the club without the truck being stolen or broken into. Quite a statement for the location.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice solution to trailer lock up. very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: "PEACE" OF MIND
customer_reviews.text: Installed within 30 seconds. I also installed locking lug nuts to keep any crooks from taking the whole tire and rim off, which would make the chock lock useless. I would recommend Trimax to market a wheel lug nut lock with the chock lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sailorborne

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what I needed. A lock to prevent theft and a chock for safety
customer_reviews.author: Brodyv33

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any trailer owner!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chock is great. I had a problem with kids kicking out he chocks from my trailer. This completely stopped that from happening. It also makes it hard for someone to try to steal my trailer. Well built!!!
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: i can sleep good now when teravelling.
customer_reviews.text: I opted for the TCL75 instead of the more popular TCL65 (weighs 4lbs less). but I drive a trike and have a big trunk. No problems locking nor unlocking. This is a deterrent for people trying to get your bike for a quick joy ride.
customer_reviews.author: TrikePete

customer_reviews.title: Visible protection
customer_reviews.text: It is very visible from a distance so that potential thieves will hopefully notice it before making a theft attempt. The fact that it comes apart for easy installation is a bonus. For additional security, a wheel lock should be installed to prevent the tire from being removed and replaced. The dust cover for the lock should keep the grime out. I liked that it came with three keys.
customer_reviews.author: Csquared

customer_reviews.title: Makes the bad guys think twice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock, fits my boat trailer easily and easy to install and lock. Good deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Bocephus Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: GREAT AS A DETERANT FOR THEFT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT AS A DETERANT FOR THEFT . I USE IT ALONG WITH OTHER LOCKS ON MY TRAILER . THE LOCK GETS RUSTY IN THE ELEMENTS.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product. It seems to be quality and easy to use. Product arrived as expected and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to secure my fifth-wheel trailer when unattended. Used with Gorilla Automotive 78681N Acorn Open End Wheel Locks (Amazon) and Heavy Duty Steel King Pin Collar Lock Coupler Trailer Lock (Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H. Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to place on any tire. Appears durable, but time will tell. Manufacturer does not offer replacement keys so if you lose/damage both keys that come with it you'll be buying an entirely new unit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Heavy duty, looks great, easy to use, great visual deterrent. Have already recommended to multiple friends and family members
customer_reviews.author: DDT71

customer_reviews.title: Could be better, but most things are more of a deterent ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it does the trick for my trailer. Could be better, but most things are more of a deterent anyway. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zbb0730

customer_reviews.title: Comes on and off easily. Secure locking alternative to prior system I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes on and off easily. Secure locking alternative to prior system I was using. Note there are two sizes of this lock for different sized wheels.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Simple, well constructed and HIGHLY visible.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, well constructed and HIGHLY visible. Should deter would be thieves who are driving by looking for an easy target. Got one for my Boat Trailer and Small T@B trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my trailor and boat.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and take off. Nice and bright so that it makes it easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Walls

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and off. No problems encounter, just lock it, and chock it. Better to be safe than sorry. Recommended to any one that value their trailer from not getting stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Will W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its ok definitely more of a deterrent than any kind of security device
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hinckley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent theft deterrent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent theft deterrent product.Would buy for any trailer that I would not want stolen.I had one trailer stole a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Swan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty wheel lock. It was too wide for ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty wheel lock. It was too wide for generator tires, but would probably work well on regular tires. Very heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: GeeWiz

customer_reviews.title: Our trailer has not been stolen since we bought this
customer_reviews.text: Our trailer has not been stolen since we bought this, so I guess it works!
customer_reviews.author: Eugenises

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. I am going to use it as a theft deterrent. Will update if it fails. My only fear is if someone tries to drive off with the chock attached to the wheel thus causing damage.
customer_reviews.author: pdxjeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very AWESOME~! Don't think anyone will be stealing my Camper
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Not only a nice piece of mind for your boat left in the driveway. Very visible and no way that I can see to get an easy cut attempt on it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S.

customer_reviews.title: Golf Cart wheel lock Club Car DS
customer_reviews.text: Used on '92 club car DS with 22"x10" wheels and tires fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use. We use it on our trailer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Riv. NJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as  I thought. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as I thought they would be Works well
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good security product for trucks and suv.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery of Amazon is excellent even to countries like India. Product is delivered within the mentioned delivery period. Build quality of Trimax TCL is quite good. It looks quite tough also. Will act as a visual deterrent to amateur thieves. But Not quite sure about the lock quality. I have Club's Tire Claw and the quality of its lock is very good. Key is also laser encrypted.
customer_reviews.author: Nitin Fbd

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to secure on wheel
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to secure on wheel, I like the cap over the lock to prevent corrosion. Comes with a lot of extra keys.
customer_reviews.author: Gearedandready

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Good help by email . I believe the wheel lock is worth the money Try one.........
customer_reviews.author: Lafitte1212

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: Great product, had no issues with securing it on the wheels. Glad I looked through previous reviews and opted for the bigger size, though this will fit smaller wheels too, it fits the wheel on our trailer just fine. Had no issues with locking the unit; you only need the key to open it, locking simply requires you to slide it shut; simple.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Trimax TCL75 Wheel Lock
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, very sturdy. Easy to install. The only reason I didnt give it an "I love it" is that it doesnt secure any of the lugnuts. When you buy this, pick up a set of locking wheel lugs at the same time. You will still have less than $70 in the buy, and it will do th trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I bought the size too big, my bad
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep my trailer from getting stolen. It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Garguilo

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 29' travel trailer
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 29' travel trailer. It's big, bright and intimidating to those who may want to steal your stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

product_meta.title: Trimax Deluxe Universal Wheel Chock Lock Dual Action Design-Chocks & Locks The Wheel TCL75, Blister Packaging
product_meta.description: Size:10.5inThe TCL75 is a deluxe wheel chock lock that can help you achieve maximum security quickly and easily for all unattended trailers, cars, boats, and more. Made of heavy-gauge powder-coated steel with a strong pick-resistant locking mechanism. Provides 7" opening when locked, an 11.25" opening when unlocked, and has a reach of 10.5". includes 2 keys.
feature_bullets: Quick and easy installation for unattended trailers, cars, boats, ATVs and more.
Built in chock prevents trailer rollaway
High strength pick resistant locking mechanism, comes with 2 keys
Made of heavy gauge rugged powder coated steel
Rubber coated arms protect wheel finish
